channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 07:57 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling.
item.description: 游댮 07:57 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 06:25 PM Anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 06:25 PM Anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
